pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP (with DirectX 11 installed.)
  • Processor: PC with 800MHz Intel速 Pentium速 III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible (Warning: there are a few reports of game crashes on old AMD cards. the developer is currently unable to reproduce.)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 11 is still highly recommended. DirectX 9 may have random crashes. For testing purpose, You can find a big town map within the first 20 minutes of gameplay. If you can stay there for a few minutes and the game does not crash, then you are likely fine.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: PC with 800MHz Intel速 Pentium速 III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GFX 1070 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
  • Additional Notes: Nvidia GPU is recommended.

content_descriptors.notes:
NEOLITHIC To the End is a mature game that regularly depicts violence, blood, strong language, alcoholic drinks, and other general mature contents through combat and story.

Being a modern-day supernatural RPG, the game also has contents related to conspiracy theories, radical politics, and atheism.

As a matter of fact, the game also has content related to LGBT. To be more specific, The player can change their character's gender at will during the game progress if they want. And there are certain characters who may fall in love with the main character without check their gender. 

There is no sexual content here right now. It's not that kind of game.
